def string_transformer(s):
    s = s.swapcase()
    s = s.split(" ")[::-1]
    s = " ".join(s)
    return s

def string_transformer(s):
  return ' '.join(word.swapcase() for word in reversed(s.split(' ')))

def string_transformer(s):
    return ' '.join([i.swapcase() for i in s.split(' ')][::-1])

def string_transformer(stg):
    return " ".join(word for word in stg.swapcase().split(" ")[::-1])
